thread.title: The Micropolitan Museum of Microscopic Art Forms has opened

post.author: BNA!
post.body:
I just ran across the Micropolitan Museum of Microscopic Art Forms:

http://www.microscopy-uk.org.uk/micropolitan/index.html

It's a phantastic source for inspiration for all mappers and especially texture / modelling artists.
The small world can look very interesting when looked at with a microscope.
